languages.text: "Плохая новость номер два — наш Главный {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидец{/g} пал в бою. Без его поддержки нам не успокоить {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} корабля. Разыскать нового {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}, тем более — {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магоса{/g}, не так уже легко. Но определенные шансы есть".

traits.locale_text: "Плохая новость номер два — наш {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Старший технопровидец{/g} пал в бою. Без его поддержки нам не успокоить {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} корабля. Разыскать нового {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}, тем более — {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магоса{/g}, не так уже легко. Но определенные шансы есть".

languages.text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."
languages.original_text: "Плохая новость номер два — наш Главный {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидец{/g} пал в бою. Без его поддержки нам не успокоить {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} корабля. Разыскать нового {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g}, тем более — {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магоса{/g}, не так уже легко. Но определенные шансы есть".

traits.locale_text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g} fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

"Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g} fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

"Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g} fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

"Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

languages.text: “第二个坏消息是，我们的主{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}在战斗中阵亡。没有他的协助，我们无法抚慰船上的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}。我们需要找到一位新的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}，而且得是一位{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}。这件事情非常困难，但并非毫无希望。”
languages.original_text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

traits.locale_text: “第二个坏消息是，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}首席引擎先知{/g}在战斗中阵亡。没有他的协助，我们无法抚慰船上的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}。我们需要找到一位新的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}，而且得是一位{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}。这件事情非常困难，但并非毫无希望。”

languages.text: 「悪い知らせリストの2番目は、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}長が戦死したことです。彼の助けなしには、この船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を鎮めることはできません。新しい{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}を、それも{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}マゴス{/g}となれば、見つけるのは容易ではありません。ですが、成功の見込みはあります」
languages.original_text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

traits.locale_text: 「悪い知らせリストの2番目は、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}長が戦死したことです。彼の助けなしには、この船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}を鎮めることはできません。新しい{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}を、それも{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}マゴス{/g}となれば、見つけるのは容易ではありません。ですが、成功の見込みはあります」

languages.text: "Punkt zwei auf der Liste der schlechten Nachrichten – unser {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher Primus{/g} ist im Kampf gefallen. Ohne seine Unterstützung können wir die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} des Schiffs nicht besänftigen. Einen neuen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} zu finden, noch dazu einen {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g}, dürfte alles andere als leicht werden. Aber es bestehen durchaus Chancen auf Erfolg."
languages.original_text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

traits.locale_text: "Punkt zwei auf der Liste der schlechten Nachrichten – unser {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}oberster Maschinenseher{/g} ist im Kampf gefallen. Ohne seine Unterstützung können wir die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} des Schiffs nicht besänftigen. Einen neuen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} zu finden, noch dazu einen {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g}, dürfte alles andere als leicht werden. Aber es bestehen durchaus Chancen auf Erfolg."

languages.text: « Deuxième mauvaise nouvelle à l'ordre du jour : notre {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure primus{/g} est tombé au combat. Sans son soutien, nous sommes incapables d'apaiser les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} du vaisseau. Trouver un nouveau {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g}, et un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} qui plus est, ne sera pas chose aisée. Heureusement, le succès reste envisageable. »
languages.original_text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

traits.locale_text: « Deuxième mauvaise nouvelle à l'ordre du jour : notre {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure en chef{/g} est tombé au combat. Sans son soutien, nous sommes incapables d'apaiser les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} du vaisseau. Trouver un nouveau {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g}, et un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} qui plus est, ne sera pas chose aisée. Heureusement, le succès reste envisageable. »

languages.text: «Segundo punto de la lista de malas noticias: nuestro {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero primero{/g} cayó en combate. Sin su asistencia, no podemos calmar a los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de la nave. Encontrar un nuevo {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g}, y especialmente un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g}, no será tarea fácil, pero cabe la posibilidad de conseguirlo».
languages.original_text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

traits.locale_text: «Segundo punto de la lista de malas noticias: nuestro {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero jefe{/g} cayó en combate. Sin su asistencia, no podemos calmar a los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de la nave. Encontrar un nuevo {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g}, y especialmente un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g}, no será tarea fácil, pero cabe la posibilidad de conseguirlo».

languages.text: "Kötü haberler listemizdeki ikinci madde: {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Başmühedyumumuz{/g} muharebede öldü. Onun yardımı olmadan geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhlarını{/g} yatıştıramayız. Yeni bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, hele ki bir {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} bulmak hiç de kolay olmayacak. Başarı ihtimali yok değil tabii."
languages.original_text: "Item two on the bad news list — our {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime fell in battle. Without his assistance, we cannot soothe the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. Finding a new {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}, and a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} at that, will be far from easy. But there is some prospect of success."

traits.locale_text: "Kötü haberler listemizdeki ikinci madde: {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Başmühedyum{/g}'umuz muharebede öldü. Onun yardımı olmadan geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhlarını{/g} yatıştıramayız. Yeni bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, hele ki bir {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} bulmak hiç de kolay olmayacak. Başarı ihtimali yok değil tabii."
